steps.name: Given I am on the HOME page
When I clock in the timesheet with PIN "2463"
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('2', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('4', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('6', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('3', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title') }).locator('div.MuiDialogActions-root').getByRole('button', { name: 'CONFIRM', exact: true })
Then I should see the employee "Isabella" in the employee list
Then I should see the "Ticket View" screen
And I should see the "GIFT CARD" category
When I add the "Acrylic removal" service to my cart
And I click on the total price of "Acrylic removal"
Click locator('.xTicketItems__info').filter({ has: locator('.itemName').filter({ hasText: 'Acrylic removal' }) }).locator('.xTicketItems__total')
Then I should see a popup dialog with title "Service: Acrylic removal - $30.00"
When I change the price to "27.5"
And I click on the "Save" button in the popup dialog
Then I should see the total price "$27.50" visible
When I select the "GIFT CARD" category
Then I should see the "Gift card $50" service
When I add the "Gift card $50" service to my cart
Then I should see a popup dialog with title "Activate Gift Card $50.00"
And I click on the "OK" button in the popup dialog
Then I should see the number card "1703" visible
When I click on the "ADD ON" button in the popup dialog
Then I should see my cart showing 1 item added
Expect "toHaveText" locator('svg[data-testid="PrintTicketIconIcon"] + span')

steps.name: And I should see the service "Gift card $50 (1703)" in my cart
When I click on the "PAY" button
Then I should see the text "PAYMENT TICKET" visible
And I should see the text "PAYMENT HISTORY" visible
And I should see the button with id "payment" visible
When I click on the element with id "payment"
Then I should see a popup dialog with title "Close Ticket"
And I should see a popup dialog with content "CHANGE$0.00OK"
When I click on the "OK" button in the popup dialog
Then I should be redirected to HOME page
When I navigate to "Tickets" on the navigation bar
Then I should be redirected to CLOSED_TICKETS page
Then I should see the toast message "Ticket data refreshed successfully." visible
Expect "toBeVisible" locator('.MuiAlert-message').filter({ hasText: 'Ticket data refreshed successfully.' })
When I wait for the page fully loaded
And I wait for the page fully loaded
Then I should see the first ticket of Cash payment "$77.50"

Expect "toBeVisible" locator('.MuiDataGrid-row').filter({ has: locator('[data-field="paymentMethod"]').filter({ hasText: 'Cash' }) }).filter({ has: locator('[data-field="paymentTotal"]').filter({ hasText: '$77.50' }) }).last()

Expect "toHaveText" locator('.MuiDataGrid-row').filter({ has: locator('[data-field="paymentMethod"]').filter({ hasText: 'Cash' }) }).filter({ has: locator('[data-field="paymentTotal"]').filter({ hasText: '$77.50' }) }).last().locator('[data-field="paymentMethod"]')

Expect "toHaveText" locator('.MuiDataGrid-row').filter({ has: locator('[data-field="paymentMethod"]').filter({ hasText: 'Cash' }) }).filter({ has: locator('[data-field="paymentTotal"]').filter({ hasText: '$77.50' }) }).last().locator('[data-field="paymentTotal"]')
When I click on the first row for payment "$77.50" to expand details
Then I should see the "Reopen ticket" button visible
When I click on the "Reopen ticket" button
Expect "toBeVisible" getByRole('button', { name: 'Reopen ticket', exact: true })
Click getByRole('button', { name: 'Reopen ticket', exact: true })
And I wait for the page fully loaded
Then I should see the "Ticket View" screen
And I should see the user info "Isabella" in the ticket
When I void the current open ticket with no reason

Expect "toBeVisible" locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'SELECT VOID REASON' }) }).or(locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'VOID TICKET' }) }))
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'SELECT VOID REASON' }) }).getByText('Mistake')
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#draggable-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'CONFIRM VOID' }) }).getByRole('button', { name: 'CONFIRM' })
